d: Umbra is a basic, highly-customizable underwear pattern.

s.legElasticLength.t: You need 2x {{{ length }}} elastic to finish the legs (optional)
s.legElasticLength.d: If you want to add elastic to your legs, you need two times {{{ length }}}.
s.waistbandElasticLength.t: You need 1x {{{ length }}} elastic to finish the waistband
s.waistbandElasticLength.d: You need {{{ length }}} of elastic to finish the waistband opening.
s.minStretch.t: You need fabric with a minimum stretch of {{ pct }}
s.minStretch.d: Your waistband and fabric needs a minimum stretch of {{ pct }} so that you can comfortably fit through the waistband opening.
s.pockets.none.d: Create the desing without any pockets (default)
s.pockets.inside.d: Create two secret pockets on the insides and a center front pouch
s.pockets.zipper.d: Create two front pockets with zippers

bulge.d: Increase the bugle angle to create more room in the front pouch. Doesn't kick in below 2 degrees.

bulgeFullness.d: Determines the roundness of the bulge. Doesn't have an effect if the bulge is disabled.

splitPosition.d: Determines the position of the crotch seam

gussetWidth.d: Controls the minimum width in the crotch area

xStretch.d: Adjust this for more or less stretchy fabric in the horizontal direction

yStretch.d: Adjust this for more or less stretchy fabric in the vertical direction

rise.d: Controls the height of the waist. A value of 100% puts the waistband onto the measured hip line.

legRise.d: Controls how high the leg is cut out

frontDip.d: Controls how much the front waist curves (revealing more or less skin)

backDip.d: Controls how much the back waist curves (revealing more or less skin)

frontExposure.d: Controls the amount of exposed skin on the front

frontReduction.d: Controls by how much the front part is slimmer than the back part

pocketHem.d: Controls how much of the lining is used to form the pocket hem. Increasing this option results in shorter pockets. Only has an effect with pockets enabled.

pocketGap.d: Controls how much space is left in the front between both pockets. Only has an effect with pockets enabled.

backExposure.d: Controls the amount of exposed skin on the back

flipBack.d: Determines if the back part should be rendered upside down
